A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely brilliant. Thrilling\, funny\, emotional\, unpredictable. Visually rich. Thematically rich. With other recent Star Wars films\, I've had to ask the question whether I liked it more or less than A New Hope or Return of the Jedi. This is the first time I've needed to ask myself whether I liked it better than Empire Strikes Back!
